entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Discarded cast on RHS of assignment leads to missing sign extension #60597
    7.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] Improve handling of blittable signatures in source generator #60596
    7.0.0
  • Productize DllImportGenerator for use outside of runtime #60595
    7.0.0
  • [Tracking] Investigate Reflection API interaction at managed/unmanaged boundary #60591
    7.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.TestGetProcesses fails on devices #60588
  • [iOS/tvOS] System.IO.FileSystem.DriveInfoTests.DriveInfoUnixTests.TestGetDrives fails on devices #60586
    7.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] System.Drawing.PrimitivesTest.RectangleTests.RectangleFConversionTest fails on devices #60585
    7.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] UserSecrets.Test.ConfigurationExtensionTest.AddUserSecrets_With_SecretsId_Passed_Explicitly fails on devices #60584
    7.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] FunctionalTests.ArrayTests.DifferentConfigSources_Merged_KeysAreSorted & WithOverwrites fail on devices #60583
    7.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_ZipArchive_Extract.ExtractToDirectoryExtension_Unicode on devices #60582
    7.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] System.IO.Compression.Tests.ZipFile_Unix.UnixCreateSetsPermissionsInExternalAttributes fails on devices #60581
    7.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] CustomAttributeDecoderTests.TestCustomAttributeDecoder failing on devices #60579
    7.0.0
  • Add latest BenchmarksGame tests to runtime tree #60578
    7.0.0
  • StructLayouts that differ between architectures and/or operating systems #60573
    7.0.0
  • [Android] System.Tests.StringTests failures for hu-HU and tr-TR cultures #60568
    7.0.0
  • The dead thread reported in ICorProfilerInfo4::EnumThreads #60566
    7.0.0
  • m_UnresolvedClassLock is held in an unsafe way for Func Evals #60565
    7.0.0
  • [Android] System.Tests.DateTimeOffsetTests & DateTimeOffset test failures #60562
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json custom converter for Dictionary<string, object> collides with JsonExtensionData #60560
  • [API Proposal]: SIMD/Vectorial operations on arrays/Spans #60559
  • [Android] System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField test failure #60558
    7.0.0
  • [mono?] Cannot run host tests due to xunit version mismatch #60550
  • [.NET 6]A derived Random class still allocates possibly unnecessary memory #60549
  • Concurrency bug with PEReader when loading from FileStream on Linux #60545
  • The XmlSchema does not correctly validate xs:NMTOKENS type restrictions with enumeration #60543
  • Non-concurrent GC is run rather than Background GC, in container with memory limit #60542
  • [API Proposal]: Generic math Assign operators #60536
  • LogLevel Filter by Category may be not working on Linux (AppServices) when dots in CategoryName are replaced by underscore #60534
  • CLRInformationVersion contains the buildNumber or version suffix #60532
    6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient.PatchAsJsonAsync() #60531
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Stream.ReadByte is miserably slow for no good reason #60587
  • dotnet process exits very slowly on MacOS #60564
  • DetectPreviewFeaturesAnalyzer: Improve diagnostic location for interface lists, abstract classes and method parameters #57224
    6.0.0
  • #48160 Comparer<T>.Default.Compare devirtualization regression #60570
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection with SessionOptions.StartTransportLayerSecurity() sends credentials in clear text on Linux #54274
    6.0.0
  • LDAP StartTLS not working on .NET 6 Preview 6 on Linux #56619
    6.0.0
  • Significant double percision calculation/storing/parsing issue #59982
    Future
  • [mono] FullAOT runtime test failures: cross-compiler can't find sibling assemblies during AOT compilation #57371
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Memory friendly methods for System.Numerics.Vectors.Vector #60535
  • [wasm] gpath.c:115: assertion 'filename != NULL' failed #60392
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Stress test regression #56310
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add an IAsyncEnumerable<T>.ToEnumerable extension method. #60106
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Outerloop test failures with QuicConnectionAbortedException instead of QuicOperationAbortedException #60405
  • Should System.Text.Json include a .NET 4.7 TFM? #38698
    Future
  • Q: move cgroup handling to managed code? #60540
  • .NET 6.0 Microbenchmarks Performance Study Report #59272
    6.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Json: why there is no PatchAsJsonAsync like PutAsJsonAsync and PostAsJsonAsync #45405
    7.0.0
  • Injection dependency on lambda expression fails. #60527

PullRequests

Created

  • Make unit tests for DllImportGenerator build/run in CI #60598
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix argument for continuing on error for spmi replay pipeline #60594
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [llvmonly] Optimize delegate invocation. #60593
    arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0] Use custom error message when running out of syncblocks #60592
  • always populate TargetHostName on SslStream #60589
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Build error 'The following files are missing entries in the templated manifest' #60580
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] DotNetHost packages are not created during source-build #60577
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Disable Linux arm64 llvm full aot runtime tests #60576
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • DotNetHost packages are not created during source-build #60575
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [Mono] Add support for "byref of any type" to the type system #60571
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [Android] Skip/tweak some System.Runtime tests #60569
  • [release/6.0] [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60561
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix invalid behavior of MoveToAttribute methods #60556
    area-System.Xml
  • Use SDK's .NETFramework refpack version #60555
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix condition for dependOnEvaluatePaths for runtime-community pipeline #60552
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix issue #60543 #60544
    area-System.Xml
  • Remove sorting requirement for interface lists #60541
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

Merged

  • Add Fuzzlyn to CI #60344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Sort oper allocation counts table #60223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT #60092
    area-Setup
  • Fix for #60532 #60572
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Update NetFramework.ReferenceAssemblies version to 1.0.2 #60554
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Fix more usages of MonoType:byref #60551
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [metadata] Cleanup some uses of m_class_get_this_arg #60557
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Revert "[release/6.0] Update IntelliSense package" #60567
  • [release/6.0] Update IntelliSense package #60488
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid a small int[] allocation in StringBuilder.Replace #60406
  • Disable PerformanceCounter_NextValue_ProcessorCounter on Windows ARM64 #60553
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • [release/6.0] Fix Int32 overflow bug in buffering logic #60460
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO
  • [hack] Mono byref of byref support #60489
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove FlakyAppHostTests category in installer tests #60354
    area-Host
  • Implement IAsyncEnumerable<T>.ToBlockingEnumerable #60363
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Fixed outerloop tests after #60181 #60465
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Fix typedef for non-void interp entry callbacks #59990
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 6.0.0
  • Experiment with Roslyn optimization for ROS<T> in assembly data section #60327

Updated

  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Process.Unix: handle ETXTBSY error when executing file that was just written by .NET. #59079
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Loop Alignment support for Arm64 #60135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not throw StackOverflow exception from `ChangeToken.OnChange` #60198
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing #60355
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add documentation on how VN numbers memory #60476
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Obsolete thumbtacked AssemblyName properties #59522
    area-System.Reflection, needs more info, community-contribution
  • [wasm] encapsulate emscripten js runtime #60504
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • fix rid processing on macOS #60494
    area-Host
  • [release/6.0] Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #58423
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [hackathon] `ValueArray` - a compliment type to the `Span`, which owns its data without indirections. #60519
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • API Implementation: Add Indexer to Vectors #60517
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Properly type primary selectors in `fgMemoryVNForLoopSideEffects` #60505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Stabilize for RTM #60294
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Convert concatenation string to interpolation for System.Private.Xml #60057
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Change Brotli Optimal CompressionLevel value #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Implement Narrow and Widen using SIMDAsHWIntrinsic #60094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] Remove duplicate entries from dotnet --info #60496
    Servicing-consider, area-Host
  • Apply style changes to System.Text.Json #60509
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [release/6.0] Update mac installers location string #60500
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60364
    area-System.Net.Http
  • CI matrix change: add Windows Server 2022 #60163
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update IntelliSense package #60487
    documentation, * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Allow interp->jit transitions for generic methods. #60461
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Experiment with Unsafe.StackAlloc<T> #60428
    area-Meta
  • S.IO.StringReader: Use ReadOnlySpan.IndexOfAny in ReadLine() for performance #60463
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Add limited support for backtracking Regex single char loops to simplified code gen #60385
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Avoid unnecessary cached char[] in StringParsingHelpers #60409
    area-System.Net
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Don't emit OVERFLOW and DIVIDED-BY-ZERO for "X div CNS" #60493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use getexepath in mono to deduplicate related code #60449
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • issue 56835 make ordered dictionary kv collection implement i list #60060
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP] Add logging of request and response #60418
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Rerun mobile target jobs when it fails for 4 known scenarios #60475
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Create a parent CMake project for building app bundles on CI #59154
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Pin stage only accepts FixedStatementSyntaxes #1653
  • Audit SRM regex code for unbounded recursion #1537
  • Could not compile program with NativeAOT #1659

PullRequests

Created

  • Set RegexOptions.ExplicitCapture when RegexOptions.NonBacktracking is set #1663
  • Add more stackoverflow avoidance to Regex #1662

Merged

  • Fix regex test failure on netfx #1661
  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1660

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: rewrite local vars to shadow stack #1658

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve workloads versioning #22151
    6.0.2xx
  • Make separate previews/RCs separate bands for workloads #22150
    7.0.1xx
  • Determine improvements to our codeflow, arcade, and signing process #22149
    6.0.2xx
  • Add additional details on the workload version in dotnet workload --list #22148
    6.0.2xx
  • Properties provided to dotnet run are also tunneled through to the application regardless of double dash (--) with .NET 5 #22133
  • Restore log message "所有项目均是最新的，无法还原" should change to "所有项目均是最新的，无需还原" #22131
  • After .NET 6.0 RTM arm64 SDK installed, "dotnet run" failed with error "A fatal error occurred..." when open 3.1/5.0 project. #22127
  • The previous project cannot be run after upgrading to from .NET 6.0 RC2 arm64 to RTM arm64. #22125
  • CopyLocalLockFileAssemblies produces broken deps.json file if PrivateAssets is set to compile #22124
  • Manually change Framework in runtimeconfig.json? #22128
  • repeat sdks, runtimes list #22118

Closed

  • Upgraded to .net 6 Preview 7 and workload commands are failing #19670
  • Running `dotnet test` on a project that uses optional workloads can't find them #21845
  • dotnet format does not work in WPF projects in .NET 6 RC 2 #22068

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable rollback support for manifest MSIs #22159
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22146
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx][blazorwasm] Fix publishing project with lazy loaded assembly #22145
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix ConcatenateCssFiles when used with Razor class libraries #21982
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.1xx
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22035
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add test retry #21186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK
  • Add a target and tests for re-generating scoped css files as part of hot reload #22103
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Only Allow Lexical Keywords in the Language #4460
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: ReadOnlySpan initialization from static data #5295

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [LSP] Investigate moving taskcompletionsource to queue item instead of callbacks #57221
  • Debugger fails to expand ref members in the same way it expands pointer members. #57220
  • [LSP] Ensure that handlers that ask for a document get a document or do not get called #57216
  • Complete Statement does not work for switch expressions #57213
  • Inconsistent val escape for extended property patterns #57209
  • Potential fixes missing add using statement in certain situations #57208
  • Need Refactor → Wrap all parameter → Align all for 'for' loop to break them into 3 lines for better readability #57205
  • VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker doesn't handle all element IDs #57203
    17.1
  • Call Hierarchy window shows duplicates for multiple target frameworks #57202
  • False positive in IDE0078 (use of pattern matching) #57199
    17.1
  • Convert to file-scoped namespace refactoring isn't applicable at all levels #57198
  • CA1845: Analyzer not being offered when scenario is hit #57197

Closed

  • CS0103 fixer for missing LHS of assignment incorrectly suggests turning missing variable into a type name. #57157
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix ServiceHub Core host option #57223
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always set BuildingInsideVisualStudio when loading MSBuild workspace #57219
    Area-IDE
  • [hackathon] Support for ValueArray in C# escape analysis. #57218
    Area-Compilers
  • Revert BG install of nuget packages #57217
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57215
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Force nuget install/uninstall to happen on UI thread #57214
    Area-IDE
  • Compute val escape for extended property patterns #57211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Extended Property Patterns
  • Explainer for list-patterns #57210
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • List patterns: Use the base node to share code #57207
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix VisualStudioActiveDocumentTracker to handle VSSELELEMID.SEID_Wind… #57206
    Area-IDE
  • Honor suppression on switch expression #57204
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Implement 'Enable nullable reference types' refactoring #57200
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Handle 'out'. Add some metadata decoding. #57163
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure that async add-using works with incomplete members #57212
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Record status for "newlines in interpolations" #57155
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57182
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Share UnnecessaryCodeFormatDefinition with VS Mac #57193
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Ensure low-pri fixes go in the right async lightbulb bucket. #57171
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Remove cancellation token from tagging context object. #57167
    Area-IDE
  • Handle symbols from metadata in OverloadResolution.IsValidParams() #57201
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57224
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move skeleton ref caching to ProjectStates #57158
    Area-IDE
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Initial fix for issue "VB Formatting of LineContinuation Wrong after _ ' Comment" #54559
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Adding some additional tests and asserts #57164
    Area-IDE
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE
  • List patterns: counterexample for non-exhaustive switch expressions #55327
    Area-Compilers
  • Completion options4 #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Ensure new files are formatted based on the right language version #57119
    Area-IDE
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Binder.CreateConversion - Report use-site diagnostics for the entire conversion hierarchy. #57175
    Area-Compilers
  • Move search under tabs #57188
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Remove unnecessary Symbol type checks #57181
    Area-Compilers
  • Build more projects during source-build #57165
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement for compiler analyzer execution #56844
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ignore a commit with mostly indent changes #57190
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements (Part 1) #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New SpaProxyManager requires port to be hit before starting dev server #37661
  • Root-level virtualization incompatible with overflow-y:scroll on html/body elements #37659
  • running AOT on a Blazor WASM app Error on .net Standard 2.0 dll #37658
  • Improve error handling in template tests #37656
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [blazor] [wasm] Unable to debug after redirect to oidc #37655
  • Add documentation for E2E Tests #37654
  • Targeting pack PlatformManifest.txt built by source-build has differences vs. official build #37651
  • Consider supporting IJSInProcessRuntime in Blazor Desktop #37647
  • Blazor + TailwindCss template #37644
    Backlog
  • Reapplying hot reload deltas on load can cause browser hang #37642
    6.0.0
  • Selecting ,Dragging and dropping text in the SummorNote throws 'Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'insertBefore')' Exception #37638
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #37636
  • Error boundary not rendering error section when throws happens within the component #37634

Closed

  • Consider adding @suppressDirective #6362
    Backlog
  • Cache RazorSourceDocument SyntaxTree when Open #24030
    Backlog
  • Localization not working with Private Use Subtags #30345
    Backlog
  • Issue in Data Annotations Localization factory #12412
    Backlog
  • ResourceType on DataAnnotationAttribute should be honored when using a DataAnnotationLocalizerProvider #19617
    Backlog
  • IViewLocalizer and IHtmlLocalizer not working as expected when used with RazorPage in a RazorClassLibrary #20673
    Backlog
  • Blazor pseudoelements when using a preprocessor #26044
    Backlog
  • Blazor: Style encapsulation does not work without a base element #37262
    Backlog
  • get access to CSS Isolation identifier #25683
    Backlog
  • Css isolation not working with Razor runtime compilation #33446
    Backlog
  • Tracking: Add support for TagsMetadata in endpoints #37543
    6.0.0
  • Add getting started docs for minimal routing and RequestDelegateFactory #31991
    6.0.0
  • Creating a ASP.NET Core Web App project with "dotnet" at the end of its name results in error 500.0 when debugging with IIS Express. #35998
    6.0.0
  • Cannot build razor view in VS2019 after installing VS2022 with errors about #line directives #37660
  • .NET 6 gRPC project templates use gRPC.Tools NuGet package which does not work on Big Sur #37060
    6.0.0
  • Templates.Test.GrpcTemplateTest.GrpcTemplate #37457
    Next sprint planning
  • DefaultTokenProviders don't work when having more than 2 user accounts #37555
    Discussions
  • Incorrect primary output path for Blazor Web Assembly project template #36463
    7.0-preview1
  • Flaky Test: "CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_LogFile" #27858
    Next sprint planning
  • CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_TestSink CheckOversizedStdErrWrites #27178
    Next sprint planning
  • Test failure CheckFrebDisconnect #29428
    Next sprint planning
  • Tag Helper enum attribute produces false IntelliCode CS0103 in a razor page in Visual Studio 2022 Preview 3.1 #36937
    6.0.0
  • Blazor PointerEventArgs.Button always -1 with svg #37213
  • Publish Blazor WebAssembly application and try to lazy load Razor Library assembly, met "Could not resolve type with token 01000014 from typeref balabala" error; #37586
  • Status code does not indicate success: 401 (Unauthorized) #37635
  • Asp.Net Core 5.0 and Angular 12 sockjs-node error #37584
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #37624

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Swashbuckle.AspNetCore version in templates (#37621) #37664
    area-web-frameworks
  • Update to stable Roslyn versions #37663
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • Enable targeting pack build during source-build #37652
  • Avoid null args when RazorDiagnostic does not have a message #37650
    Servicing-consider
  • Avoid null args when RazorDiagnostic does not have a message #37648
    area-razor.compiler
  • [release/6.0] Switch to stable RTM branding #37643
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `075810f` to `16f637f` #37640
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix playwright tests on helix matrix #37518
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Cherry-pick #37414 to [release/6.0] for #37340 #37417
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Bump Swashbuckle.AspNetCore version in templates #37621
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • [AzureB2C] Fix missing sign in button #37601
    area-mvc
  • Specify the correct path for BlazorWASM project #37567
    area-mvc
  • Enable helix retry for a small set of tests #37137
    area-infrastructure
  • [Backport][Blazor] JS root component registration #37598
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor
  • Fix virtualization horizontal scrolling #37585
